description.narrative: El objetivo del Programa es fortalecer el núcleo de servicios agropecuarios que proveen acceso a la tecnología productiva aplicada correspondiendo a oportunidades del mercado, mientras que reduzcan los riesgos de amenazas a la sanidad agropecuaria y a la inocuidad de alimentos.

The Program objective is to stengthen the core public agricultural services that provide access to applied production technology corresponding to market opportunites, while reducing the risks derived from threats to plant and animal health and food safety. This in turn will contribute to the broader goal to enhance the competitive prodcuteve base upon which Belizeans can increase their incomes.
